Function Documentation

int fileExists ( const char *  filename  ) 

Checks for the existence of a file with name filename.

Parameters:
filename The name of the file we need to check.
Return values:
0 File does not exist.
1 File exists.

int getFileSize ( FILE *  f  ) 

Returns the size of a file.

Parameters:
f The file whose size needs to be determined.
Returns:
The size in bytes of the file, -1 if f is an invalid file.
